abstract: Burlington Northern Santa Fe shareholders have approved the railroad’s sale to Berkshire Hathaway, controlled by Warren Buffett, paving the way for the Oracle of Omaha to complete his biggest acquisition.
snippet: Burlington Northern Santa Fe shareholders have approved the railroad’s sale to Berkshire Hathaway, controlled by Warren Buffett, paving the way for the Oracle of Omaha to complete his biggest acquisition.
lead_paragraph: Burlington Northern Santa Fe shareholders have approved the railroad’s sale to Berkshire Hathaway, controlled by Warren Buffett, paving the way for the Oracle of Omaha to complete his biggest acquisition.

headline.main: Burlington Northern Investors Approve Berkshire Deal
